The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 16 January is 2,922,841 (5,192.7 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 11 January, there were 316,283 new confirmed cases (561.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 04 January, there were 382,823 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 17% (66,540 fewer cases).
